name: Silibil N' Brains
description: '''Silibil N' Brains''' are a [[Scottish hip-hop]] duo consisting of Gavin Bain and Billy Boyd (not to be confused with Scottish actor [[Billy Boyd]]). They are well known for masquerading as American rappers from [[California]] to secure a record deal, a story which formed the basis of Bain's 2010 memoir ''California Schemin<nowiki>'</nowiki>'' (later reprinted as ''Straight Outta Scotland'') and was told in the 2013 documentary film ''[[The Great Hip Hop Hoax]]'', directed by British filmmaker [[Jeanie Finlay]].
